Package hr.fer.zemris.lsystems.impl

Class TurtleState

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.lsystems.impl.TurtleState

  • public class TurtleState
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the state of the turtle when drawing lsystem's state using Painter.
    Author:
    Dorian Ivankovic

        public TurtleState​(Vector2D position,
                   Vector2D direction,
                   java.awt.Color color,
                   double step)
        Constructor for TurtleState.
        Parameters:
        position - - position of the turtle
        direction - - direction of the turtle - normalised vector
        color - - color used for drawing lines in the current TurtleState
        step - - Step size of the turtle's transition to the next point
